name: thick-club
effect: Held by Cubone or Marowak: Doubles the holder’s Attack.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A bone of some sort. It can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises CUBONE or MAROWAK’s ATTACK.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A hard bone of some sort to be held by a CUBONE or MAROWAK. It raises the ATTACK stat.
